metadata.Title: CVE-2023-6816 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Heap buffer overflow in DeviceFocusEvent and ProcXIQueryPointer

criterions.comment: xorg: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
xorg-server: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
xorg-server-hwe-16.04: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
